summary: This document contains due diligence research results for Southern Trust Company, Inc. conducted in accordance with AML Compliance standards. The research found no significant negative media or legal alerts associated with the company, indicating a clean record in the searched databases.
keyFacts: The due diligence research found no significant negative media results for Southern Trust Company, Inc.
No alerts were generated from the searches conducted in the required databases.
The document emphasizes the importance of escalating accounts involving Politically Exposed Persons (PEPs).
All searches returned no information found in various categories including negative media, public records, and court cases.
The document is marked as confidential and for internal use only.
